# GraphQL Apollo Server Example

This example shows how to implement a **GraphQL server with TypeScript** based on [Prisma Client](https://www.prisma.io/docs/concepts/components/prisma-client), [apollo-server](https://www.apollographql.com/docs/apollo-server/) and [Nexus Schema](https://nxs.li/components/standalone/schema).
